conbody.p: We're nearing the end of our conduits series. The last remaining major point is buffering and resumable sources. (I would have included it hear, but (a) it doesn't exactly fit with the rest of the material and (b) it's 10:30 at night and I want to go to sleep.) In addition, we'll try to cover some real-life use cases for conduits, and give examples of where libraries like http-conduit and the upcoming conduit-based wai can be used together.
